properties.entry: SELECT COUNT(*) COUNT FROM MEMBER WHERE MEM_ACCESS = 'BLOCK'

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM, B.* FROM (SELECT MEM_ID , MEM_NICK , RCATEGORY_NAME , BLOCK_DATE FROM REPORT JOIN REPORT_CATEGORY ON (REPORT_SORT = RCATEGORY_NO) JOIN MEMBER ON (REPORTED_MEM_NO = MEM_NO) WHERE MEM_ACCESS = 'BLOCK' ORDER BY BLOCK_DATE) B ORDER BY ROWNUM DESC) WHERE ROWNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
UPDATE MEMBER SET MEM_ACCESS = 'UNBLOCK' , BLOCK_DATE = '' WHERE MEM_ID = ?
